reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are clear, and she is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Great teacher, but his exams are tough. Make sure to attend all classes and do the assignments.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Davis knows her stuff, but her lectures can be a bit dry. The course material is interesting though.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Brown makes the concepts understandable and engaging. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a good professor, but her grading is very strict. Pay attention to lab work.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are not very engaging, and he reads off slides most of the time. Not my favorite class.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is excellent! She makes economics easy to understand and is very passionate about the subject.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: The class is okay, but Dr. Moore's exams are tricky. Study hard and ask questions during lectures.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting course and Dr. Clark is very knowledgeable. Sometimes the readings are a bit too much.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is a fantastic professor! His classes are thought-provoking and he encourages open discussion.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is a great professor, but the workload can be intense. Be prepared to write a lot.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: The class material is interesting, but Dr. King doesn't seem very engaged with the students.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is passionate about art history and it shows. Her lectures are captivating and informative.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is knowledgeable, but his teaching style is a bit monotonous. The labs are fun though.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting course with a lot of fieldwork. Dr. Martin is approachable and helpful.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Dr. White is a brilliant musician and an even better teacher. He makes complex concepts easy to grasp.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Statistics is a tough subject, and Dr. Young's lectures are sometimes hard to follow. Study groups help.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Dr. Green is very knowledgeable, but his classes are fast-paced. Be sure to keep up with the reading.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is an outstanding professor! Her classes are interactive and relevant to real-world marketing.

reviews.subject: Finance
reviews.review: Finance is a difficult subject and Dr. Nelson's teaching style doesn't make it any easier.
